paragraph.paragraph:
Right clicking on any item displayed in the
index.xml Class View will open a context menu for that item, as demonstrated in the following screenshot:

In this example, the tree node representing the Eiffel class
APPLICATION is the subject of the context menu, which was opened as the result of a right click. The entries available on the context menu perform the following actions:

list.item:
Go to Definition: Opens the Eiffel class containing the definition in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/50_The_Eiffel_Editor/index.xml Editor .

Browse Definition: Sends the current target of the menu, to the current
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/40_object_browser/index.xml Object Browser .
Quick Find Symbol: Performs a quick find using the text of the current target as the search argument.
Copy: Copies the text of the current target to the clipboard.

Sort Alphabetically: Sorts all items in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/40_object_browser/index.xml Object Browser alphabetically.

Sort By Type: Sorts all items in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/40_object_browser/index.xml Object Browser by type.

Sort By Access: Sorts all items in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/40_object_browser/index.xml Object Browser by access type.

Group By Type: Sorts all items in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/40_object_browser/index.xml Object Browser by type.
